name: anonimlifeforlife
short_description: Fawkes anonymization proxy worker. Accepts image_url or base64, calls your VPS, returns cloaked image as base64.
long_description: Serverless worker that fetches an image (URL or base64), uploads to your Fawkes VPS (FastAPI), polls until ready, and returns the anonymized image as base64. Designed for CPU workers.

env.name: VPS_BASE
env.description: Base URL of your VPS Fawkes API (e.g., https://anon.donkeybee.com)

env.name: POLL_MAX_SECONDS
env.description: Max seconds to wait for result
